name: Duskers
summary:
Misfits Attic制作发行的一款冒险解谜类Rogue游戏。

About This Game In Duskers you pilot drones into derelict spaceships to find the means to survive and piece together how the universe became a giant graveyard
在游戏中，你将操纵无人机到废弃的飞船中寻找生存的方法，收集剧情碎片，拼凑导致宇宙成为巨型坟墓的真相。
Features
- Use a Command Line Interface to control drones & ship systems    使用指令行界面控制无人机&飞船
- Explore procedurally generated derelict ships and universe    随机地图&宇宙
- Upgrade and modify drones with the salvage you find     捡破烂，升级&改装你的无人机
- Discover ship logs and piece together what happened    探索飞船日志收集剧情碎片
